title: Nailhead
summaries: The Nailhead is a Hardmode, post-Plantera enemy found only during the Solar Eclipse event. In addition to dealing high contact damage, the Nailhead has a 1/3 (33.33%) chance to fire three to five Nail projectiles in a wide spread when attacked. He has significantly more health than most other Solar Eclipse enemies and has a high resistance to knockback.

He is one of the few entities that can be detected by the <linked>Lifeform Analyzer</linked> or its upgrades. The Nailhead requires 25 kills to be awarded completion of his <linked>Bestiary</linked> entry and corresponding <linked>banner</linked>, as opposed to the usual 50 kills.
